com.ooyala.android.plugin

Interface AdPluginInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AdsLearnMoreInterface, LifeCycleInterface
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SsaiPluginInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ManagedAdsPlugin, OoyalaManagedAdsPlugin

    public interface AdPluginInterface
extends LifeCycleInterface, AdsLearnMoreInterface
    The interface that must be implemented in order to plug into OoyalaPlayer to play ads.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allADSPlayed() 
      java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> getCuePointsInMilliSeconds()
      This returns the cue points.
      PlayerInterface getPlayerInterface()
      This is called ooyala UI pass down UI related events.
      void onAdIconClicked(int index)
      This is called when an icon is clicked.
      void onAdModeEntered()
      This is called when control is handed over to the plugin
      boolean onContentChanged()
      This is called when content changed
      boolean onContentError(int errorCode)
      This is called when an error occured when playing back content
      boolean onContentFinished()
      This is called before finishing playing content so plugin can play postroll
      boolean onCuePoint(int cuePointIndex)
      This is called when a cue point is reached so plugin can play midroll
      boolean onInitialPlay()
      This is called before start playing content so plugin can play preroll
      boolean onPlayheadUpdate(int playhead)
      This is called when playhead is updated so plugin can play midroll
      void resetAds()
      This is called to reset all ads to unplayed.
      void skipAd()
      This is called to skip the current ad.

    • Method Detail

      • onContentChanged

        boolean onContentChanged()
        This is called when content changed
        Returns:
        a token string if plugin wants take control, null otherwise

      • onInitialPlay

        boolean onInitialPlay()
        This is called before start playing content so plugin can play preroll
        Returns:
        a token string if plugin wants take control, null otherwise

      • onPlayheadUpdate

        boolean onPlayheadUpdate(int playhead)
        This is called when playhead is updated so plugin can play midroll
        Returns:
        a token string if plugin wants take control, null otherwise

      • onContentFinished

        boolean onContentFinished()
        This is called before finishing playing content so plugin can play postroll
        Returns:
        a token string if plugin wants take control, null otherwise

      • onCuePoint

        boolean onCuePoint(int cuePointIndex)
        This is called when a cue point is reached so plugin can play midroll
        Returns:
        a token string if plugin wants take control, null otherwise

      • onContentError

        boolean onContentError(int errorCode)
        This is called when an error occured when playing back content
        Returns:
        a token string if plugin wants take control, null otherwise

      • onAdModeEntered

        void onAdModeEntered()
        This is called when control is handed over to the plugin

      • getPlayerInterface

        PlayerInterface getPlayerInterface()
        This is called ooyala UI pass down UI related events.
        Returns:
        an object that implements PlayerInterface if plugin needs to process ui events, null if these events should be ignored.

      • resetAds

        void resetAds()
        This is called to reset all ads to unplayed.

      • skipAd

        void skipAd()
        This is called to skip the current ad.

      • onAdIconClicked

        void onAdIconClicked(int index)
        This is called when an icon is clicked.
        Parameters:
        index - the icon index

      • getCuePointsInMilliSeconds

        java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> getCuePointsInMilliSeconds()
        This returns the cue points.

      • allADSPlayed

        boolean allADSPlayed()
        Returns:
        true if all ads were played
